峾字的基本解释

峾
yín
〔峾沦〕水回旋的样子。

峾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yín］
［《集韻》魚巾切，平諄，疑。］
见“峾淪”。

峾字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　峾； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页312第19
【集韻】魚巾切，音銀。峾淪，水回旋貌。【郭璞·江賦】峾淪溛瀤，乍浥乍堆。　【正字通】六書無峾。一本作沄淪。

峾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
峾字的起名意思

峾沦，水回旋的样子。

Basic explanation of words
De
yín
[Derun] The water swirling.
De
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yín］
["Jiyun" fish towel cut, flat and suspicious. ]
See "Deren".
De
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　峾; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 312 Page 19
[Jiyun] Fish towel cut, with silver tone. Deren, the appearance of water swirling. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] Destroyed by Xiaoying, Zhazha Zha Zha.　【Zhengzitong】The six books have no morals. One book is stupefied.
